title: In-progress projects
lede:
Federal state agencies collaborate with external partners to answer important research, policy, and programmatic questions. Some projects the Evaluation Officer Council (EOC) works on directly and others EOC catalyzes and finds research expertise to support. Learn more about in-progress projects here.

EOC created the Evaluation.gov Project Portal to share opportunities for partnering with state agencies on their research needs and for people to express interest in pursuing those opportunities. Have a question about partnerships? Visit our [FAQ](/about) page.
